parse.title: Letter to Clyde S. Kilby (4 June 1968)

links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien

wikitext.*:
On [[4 June]] [[1968]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Clyde S. Kilby]]'''.

*'''Subject:''' Tolkien is moving to the South Coast of England.
*'''Publication:''' A part of the letter was published as [[letter 304]] in ''[[The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien]]''. Other excerpts from the letter have been published in [[SEVEN 27|''SEVEN'', Volume 27]] (p. 49) and ''[[Tolkien and the Silmarillion]]'' (p. 40). A longer part of the letter was published in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide|The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]'' (p. 726).
{{title}}
